alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 11 at 10:36PM CST until November 11 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN HIDALGO COUNTY... At 1035 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tierra Del Sol Golf Course, or over Pharr, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...KMFE reported a wind gust of 59 mph. Hail remains Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pharr, Weslaco, San Juan, Alamo, Donna, Hidalgo, Sharyland, South McAllen, Austin Middle School and Mcallen High School. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
